data.details:
Basic Troop Camp Training
Girl Scouts of Gateway Council’s Basic Troop Camp Certification enables you to provide an amazing outdoor adventure for your girls.  Any of the registered Volunteers within a Troop may be designated as the Troop Outdoor Coordinator and complete this training.  Please note that you must complete all 3 sessions to receive your Basic Troop Camp Certification.
 
Basic Troop Camp Certification (Self-Guided):   You will be introduced to the basics of camping, from preparing your girls for the outdoor experience, to planning and budgeting for the overnight trip.  You will learn about important safety procedures and council policies involved with making your trip a success.  Instructions regarding the online Self-Guided material will be emailed once your registration for this training is finalized.  Important Note:  The Self-Guided session will need to be completed prior to your In-Town session.
 
Basic Troop Camp Certification (In-Town):  This fun and interactive session will further complement the skills you have developed by allowing you to work closely with a camp trained individual who will ensure that you have everything you need to properly camp in the outdoors.  This In-Town session is a planning workshop designed specifically for your overnight adventure.  Your facilitator will guide you through a unique and wonderful camping experience!
 
Session 3 (Overnight): This exciting overnight session will complete your camping certification.  You will utilize the skills developed during your previous sessions to further understand the outdoor experience.
 
Registering for this session registers you for the intown as well as the overnight sessions.
data.srchdisp: Girl Scouts of Gateway Council’s Basic Troop Camp Certification enables you to provide an amazing outdoor adventure for your girls.
